text: Piotr Ligienza (born 31 May 1982) is a Polish actor. He was known for his roles in the series Ranczo and Synowie. He has appeared in the play "Romulus Wielki (directed by Krzysztof Zanussi). Ligienza was born in Dzierżoniów, Poland. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors
title: Piotr Ligienza
